summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the execution of an agreement with the State of Washington, Department of Highways, for the allocation of federal aid funds in aid of the cost of preparing plans, specifications and cost estimates for the construction of traffic control modernization and exclusive transit lanes in the Pike-Pine Street Project, First Avenue to East Madison Street under the Federal Highway Act of 1970, 23 U.S. Code Highways, Federal Aid "M" Program.
